name: Mistresses
overview: Meet Savi, a successful career woman working toward the next phase in her life—both professional and personal—simultaneously bucking for partner at her law firm while she and her husband, Harry, try to start a family of their own. Savi's free-spirited and capricious baby sister, Josselyn, couldn't be more different—living single, serial dating and partying, and regularly leaning on her big sister along the way. Their common best friend, April, a recent widow and mother of two, is rebuilding her life after tragedy and learning to move forward, with the support and guidance of her closest girlfriends. And friend Karen, a successful therapist with her own practice, reconnects with the girls after her involvement in a complicated relationship with a patient goes far too deep.
tagline: Four friends. Four hearts. 13 weeks of seduction.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: As Savannah and her husband are faced with fertility issues, Savannah finds herself attracted to a flirtatious colleague; recent widow April becomes convinced that her husband is actually still alive; Karen deals with the ramifications of an affair.

episodes.name: The Morning After
episodes.overview: While Karen counsels Savi to hold a beat before confessing to husband Harry about her night with Dominic, Savi gets an entirely different reaction from April. Meanwhile, April investigates a woman's shocking claims that her late husband, Paul, had another life; Joss finds a friend in new client Alex, and Karen warily agrees to meet with Sam Grey.

episodes.name: Breaking and Entering
episodes.overview: Tensions escalate at work between Savi and Dom; Joss's new boss Olivier -- very French and very unimpressed with her -- gives her an impossible assignment; and Karen continues to be drawn into the dysfunctional Grey family orbit.

episodes.name: A Kiss Is Just a Kiss?
episodes.overview: Savi finds out she's pregnant and knows there's a good chance the baby is indeed Harry's and not a result of the one-time affair she had with Dom. Joss finds herself befriending her gay real estate client, Alex, who has a controlling significant other. April is pressured by the woman who claims she had a child by April's dead husband. Also, despite Savi's advice to the contrary, Karen continues to find herself drawn to the company of Sam Grey, the college-aged son of her dead lover.

episodes.name: Decisions, Decisions
episodes.overview: Savi is anxious to find out her paternity test results, while trying to hide her pregnancy from Harry. Meanwhile the friendship between Joss and her gay client, Alex, takes an interesting turn when Alex breaks up with her girlfriend; April and Richard are brought closer together when their 10-year-old daughters don't show up for school; and after Karen receives a visit from a private investigator seeking answers surrounding her lover's death, she meets with his widow, Elizabeth Grey.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.overview: Savi desperately tries to make things right with Harry, but he continues to avoid her and discussion of their future; Karen is frightened when, on the heels of the insurance investigation, someone breaks into her office and may have accessed her patient files; April and Richard's romance heats up; and Olivier continues to make Joss's life miserable at the office.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.overview: Joss, terribly hurt that Savi hid her pregnancy and her illicit affair from her, moves in with April; Harry and Dominic angrily face off at a social event; Karen meets up again with Detective Newsome, but this time it's personal; and April struggles to put memories of her dead husband behind her so she can move on with a relationship with Richard.

episodes.name: Ultimatum
episodes.overview: Savi wants to fight for her relationship with Harry, even if the baby is Dom's; April is still reeling from the revelation that her supposedly dead husband, Paul, is actually alive; Karen is surprised when Sam hires her business partner as his therapist and seeks out his mother, Elizabeth, to express her concern; and after an uncomfortable run-in with Alex's ex, Joss wants to redefine her relationship with Alex.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
episodes.overview: When Savi and Joss’s free-spirited, open-minded and often absent mother, Janet, comes for an unexpected visit, she brings big news but also stirs up some long-simmering family tensions. Now that Karen realizes that Elizabeth Grey knew all along about her affair with Tom, she wonders if Elizabeth might have actually killed Tom because of her; and April questions whether she should tell her daughter she’s dating Richard, although she has yet to tell Richard about the return of her supposedly-dead husband.

episodes.name: Indecent Proposals
episodes.overview: As single mom-to-be Savi begins to grasp that Harry may never be coming back, Dom offers her a shoulder to lean on. April is furious when Paul shows up at Lucy's school and shares her frustration with Richard, who decides to take matters into his own hands. Karen and Sam reconnect after she realizes Savi won't give her information about Elizabeth's lawsuit against her; and at work Joss tries to win over Olivier by helping him impress new real estate clients.

episodes.name: Full Disclosure
episodes.overview: Karen begins her deposition into her possible role in the death and cover-up of her lover, Thomas Grey, where his son, Sam, has promised to be her alibi. Dominic surprises Karen when he brings in private detective Anthony Newsome to testify. After Joss tells Harry that Savi has yet to open up her paternity results, he decides to go to the clinic to find out for himself. And April and Richard, who have broken up, remember they made an amusement park date with their kids they have to keep. Meanwhile, Joss's feelings for Olivier are stirred up when Alex asks her if she misses sleeping with a man.

episodes.name: When One Door Closes...
episodes.overview: The judge delivers a shocking ruling in Grey Vs Kim. While the case is closed, there is even more trouble on the horizon for Karen; Paul helps a frantic April search for Lucy after the school reports that she's gone missing; Joss tries to salvage her relationship with Alex after she learns Joss slept with Olivier; and Savi is receptive to Dom's advances, and accepts the fact that Harry is no longer part of her life... until she learns some disturbing news about the state of Harry's restaurant.

episodes.name: I Choose You
episodes.overview: The ladies plan a lavish birthday getaway to Palm Springs for Savi, but the fates conspire against them, as Joss realizes Harry has stolen the test results that would reveal whether he or Dom fathered Savi's baby; April makes a choice on which man to keep in her life; and Elizabeth Grey decides to settle the score, once and for all, with Karen.

episodes.name: Rebuild
episodes.overview: Savi takes advantage of her second chance. Karen struggles with loss. April's friend Mickey returns. Joss acts as a party planner for Angelenos.

episodes.name: Boundaries
episodes.overview: April starts an affair with Daniel Zamora. Joss and Harry clash after they’re employed to throw a lavish party for a wealthy housewife.

episodes.name: Open House
episodes.overview: Joss attempts to be a mediator as Savi and Harry fall out as they sell their home. Toni continues to annoy Savi.

episodes.name: Friends With Benefits
episodes.overview: Joss finds a potential suitor, whilst looking for new clients at a charity event. Savi falls for a new man. April introduces Daniel to her friends. Karen's upset as she has no look in the dating game.

episodes.name: Playing With Fire
episodes.overview: A reckless side of Savi is shown after she cavorts with Zack. Karen attempts to deal her new addiction. Scott tells Joss about his fantasy.

episodes.name: What Do You Really Want?
episodes.overview: Joss receives some surprising news from Harry. Karen's secret life starts to become a problem after she meets a man she finds intriguing.  April turns down a dinner invitation.

episodes.name: Why Do Fools Fall in Love?
episodes.overview: April tells Daniel the truth and prepares for his reaction. Meanwhile, Dom discovers Savi is lying about Zack, Scott's job causes complications in his relationship with Joss and Jacob has some promising news for Karen.

episodes.name: An Affair to Surrender
episodes.overview: Savi bids adieu to her house with help from her pals. Meanwhile, Joss plots to keep Harry in the U.S.; Karen faces a challenging predicament regarding Jacob and her client. April's roles as a mom and a mistress result in unexpected conflict.

episodes.name: Coming Clean
episodes.overview: April's haunted by her past, as well as by a mysterious man. Meanwhile, Savi contacts her estranged father, Karen finds it difficult to get Anna to be honest. Elsewhere, Toni shares some news with Dom.

episodes.name: Charades
episodes.overview: April discovers who's been stalking her. Meanwhile, Karen volunteers to assist Anna; Toni's hidden agenda is revealed, and it affects Savi and Dom; and Harry rattles Joss' confidence as she prepares to meet Scott's large family.

episodes.name: Choices
episodes.overview: April deals with disloyalty in her life. Meanwhile, Joss shares a surprising revelation; Karen receives a tempting offer from Jacob; and Dom wants to turn the tables on Toni.

episodes.name: Surprise
episodes.overview: April works with the FBI to try and locate Paul and attempts to stop Lucy from finding out what's going on between her and Daniel. An ex partner has surprising news for Karen, who is forced to do some soul-searching.

episodes.name: 'Til Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: The ladies prepare for Joss' engagement party; Karen awaits her test results; April relies on Daniel to keep Lucy and her safe; Savi considers revealing her change of heart.

episodes.name: Gone Girl
episodes.overview: Karen has some bad news to tell Joss and she manages to interrupt her and Harry as they kiss on the beach.

episodes.name: I'll Be Watching You
episodes.overview: The drama and intrigue continues as new friendships are forged, relationships are set on a complicated course and mysterious plans are set in motion.

episodes.name: Odd Couples
episodes.overview: Secrets, distractions and a doctor with the personal touch lead to some interesting pairings.

episodes.name: Into the Woods
episodes.overview: Joss moves too quickly in her new relationship with Harry. Karen and Vivian grow closer. April gets some parenting lessons on a camping trip. Calista finally sees Luca's true motives.

episodes.name: Threesomes
episodes.overview: Blair agrees to go out with April. Joss and Harry's relationship becomes strained.

episodes.name: Love Is an Open Door
episodes.overview: Marc makes a bad judgment call. Harry and Joss cope in different ways. Calista seeks revenge.

episodes.name: The Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: After sleeping with the boss's mistress, Harry ends up involved in a new career venture. Karen enters into an uncharted territory in her relationship.

episodes.name: Murder She Wrote
episodes.overview: Lucy witnesses Blair's strict side as he and April grow closer. Vivian finds out about Karen and Alec's deception. Marc fights his demons when his pride is bruised.

episodes.name: Unreliable Witnesses
episodes.overview: A visit to the doctor leaves Karen stunned. Blair and April's relationship moves forward. Harry helps Marc battle his demons. Joss desperately needs evidence against Calista.

episodes.name: What Could Have Been
episodes.overview: Joss thinks about what her life with Scott could have been like. Karen comes to a monumental decision. April and Daniel sleep together. Daniel has a tape that could benefit Joss.

episodes.name: Guilt by Association
episodes.overview: Karen shares her baby news with Alec and Vivian, and Vivian has news of her own. Meanwhile, April and Blair's romance hits a rough patch, which bonds April and Lucy, Daniel's tape poses a problem for Calista, and Joss gets more bad news from the police.

episodes.name: Reasonable Doubt
episodes.overview: Joss considers taking the plea deal and what that would mean for a future with Harry; Karen helps Vivian keep her secret from Alec; Marc's sister surprises him and April.

episodes.name: Goodbye Girl
episodes.overview: In the third-season finale, Joss is granted her freedom, but she may lose Harry because of his new job prospect. Meanwhile, Marc's absence causes April to come to a realization, Vivian's condition worsens, and Joss receives a puzzling present.

episodes.name: The New Girls
episodes.overview: Joss testifies at Wilson's murder trial a year after her perilous encounter with him. Marc has employment problems. Karen thinks her male nanny is making advances toward her. April fears Lucy is growing up too fast.

episodes.name: Mistaken Identity
episodes.overview: Harry's sister arrives for a visit and reveals that all is not well between her and her fiancé. Joss has trouble celebrating her own engagement. April learns about a painting fellowship. Marc joins a band. Karen bonds with her male nanny.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: Kate soon realizes dating in Los Angeles is a little harder than she expected. Harry has an exciting new job venture while April finally realizes what her passion is with a little help from Marc. The boundaries between Karen and her many, Robert, become complicated. Meanwhile, Joss is still trying to figure out how to deal with the aftermath of the past year.

episodes.name: Blurred Lines
episodes.overview: Karen realizes she’s very happy to be back working with her clients again, despite putting her love life on hold. April’s new client gets a little too close for comfort, while someone from Marc’s past becomes very present. Kate struggles after learning her ex-fiancé is dating someone else, while Joss plays dirty to get a new client.

episodes.name: Lean In
episodes.overview: Karen's agent is unimpressed with her new book proposals. April quits her job after being kissed by Michael. Joss and Harry struggle with their new working relationship.

episodes.name: What Happens In Vegas
episodes.overview: Alec visits unexpectedly and disrupts Karen's life with his news. April and Marc clash on a parenting issue. Kate learns that her new beau has a connection to Joss and Harry. Harry's business partner invites him and Joss to Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Survival of the Fittest
episodes.overview: Custody issues arise regarding Vivian. April discusses a mature topic with Lucy. Kate keeps her new beau a secret from Joss and Harry. Joss' actions lead to problems with Harry and land Jonathan's nephew in the hospital.

episodes.name: Bridge Over Troubled Water
episodes.overview: April's mom pays her a visit, which stirs up trouble. Karen is unsure about her new nanny. Harry struggles with fame. Joss discovers her ex-fiancee is dating Kate.

episodes.name: The Root of All Evil
episodes.overview: April's mom causes trouble in April and Marc's relationship. Karen meets a new guy after Lydia secretly sets up an online dating profile for her. Kate makes a change in her living arrangements. Joss takes pills to cope with her anxiety.

episodes.name: Confrontations
episodes.overview: Marc focuses on his music and bonds with Sofia. Lydia tries to ruin Karen's new romance. April makes a decision after observing her mother's display of intolerance. Joss deals with the death of a friend from her impact class.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: Karen fires Lydia when she uncovers her deception. Harry juggles too many business opportunities. Joss and her impact-class pals seek to avenge their friend's killer. Marc resists April's attempt to reconcile.
